mapper.select: select count(re.id) from cs_send_record re,cs_info info
mapper.update: update cs_send_record set adopt_status=#{adopt_status},adopt_dtime=#{adopt_dtime},adopt_desc=#{adopt_desc} where id in (${ids})
mapper.delete: delete from cs_send_record where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select distinct send_site_id,send_app_id from cs_send_record where send_app_id='cms' order by send_site_id
select re.*,info.title from cs_send_record re,cs_info info order by ${sort_name} ${sort_type} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(id) from cs_send_record where site_id=#{site_id}
mapper.delete: delete from cs_send_record where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select top ${page_size} * from cs_send_record where site_id=#{site_id} and id not in ( select top ${start_num} id from cs_send_record where site_id=#{site_id} order by id desc ) order by id desc
select distinct t_site_id,t_site_name from cs_send_record where send_site_id=#{site_id}

select distinct send_user_id as user_id,count(id) send_count from cs_send_record
group by send_user_id order by 1

select distinct send_cat_id as cat_id,count(id) send_count from cs_send_record
group by send_cat_id order by 1
